channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Écouter et répéter is SO last century"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Écouter et répéter is SO last century"

item.title: Suggestion from rilian (@rilian)
item.description: Just pure spherical syntax in vacuum? Meh. How about change the topic a little, and provide Ruby-language specific solutions for most common software architecture design patters used in networked software such as Rails and REST APIs ?
